<< Usage >>
1. Create empty under canvas.
2. Add EasyEndCredits component to that empty.
3. Create template Texts and set to EasyEndCredits.textPrefabs.
4. Create image and set to EasyEndCredits.imagePrefabs. (if needed)
5. Create credits file and set to EasyEndCredits.credits.
6. Play!

<< Credits file >>
Credits file is a simple script. 

Commands:
* \{text "Param"} ... change Text prefab.
* \{img "Param"} ... show image.
* \{event "Param"} ... call event callback.
* | ... Multi columns.

See samples.
